The Pony Music Archive

About

The Pony fandom has produced an amazing amount of music of all kinds. Welcome to the largest high-quality archive of Pony music since 2016, we have tens of thousands of tracks from 3000 artists, and over 100 albums!

This is a spiritual successor to the MLP Music Archive, but actively maintained and gathering songs from the best sources available.

The Raw archive is huge, with over 500 GB of single tracks plus 100 GB of albums, so we recommend downloading the much smaller High Quality or Phone Quality versions.

Download
